snippet.title: Guns Girl Z - Promotional Video for Honkai Gakuen Arc Theme Song "Resist -Ist"
snippet.description:
❗️❗️Disclaimer❗️❗️
This video is wholly owned by Mihoyo. This video is made for promotion only. If any related parties object or are offended, please contact me at the email contact provided. If there is an interest in the video in question, please convey it to mihoyo directly. I have no right to answer those interests. 

Honkai Gakuen 2 Official Account in Bili Bili : 
https://space.bilibili.com/133934/

Honkai Gakuen 2 Official Account in BBS : 
https://www.miyoushe.com/bh2/

Honkai Gakuen 2 Official Account JP Server:
http://www.mihoyo.co.jp/

Honkai Gakuen 2 Official Account JP Server in Twitter :
https://twitter.com/Houkaigakuen

The source of the video comes from the Official Bili Bili Honkai Gakuen 2 website: 
https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV1gk4y1F7CM/

Official Site Honkai Gakuen 2 (GGZ): https://www.benghuai.com/
===========================================================
[Official's Note]

"Now I've caught a glimmer of life, can't let go, can't give up" 

 Honkai Gakuen 2 New Main Theme Song - "RESIST-IST" has been released!

Singing a Song of Determination from Girls to Surpass The「Destiny」

「RESIST-IST」
 Performance, Lyrics, Music by MYTH & ROID

 Planning: Literary Girl Lingyi PV: @AKAMEI_明 
========================
You can interact with me on the following social media:
🌟 Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/BluezeCDA
🌟 Hoyolab Community : https://www.hoyolab.com/accountCenter/postList?id=149548980
🌟 Instagram : https://www.instagram.com/BluezeC_DA/
🌟 Twitter : https://twitter.com/BluezeC_DA
🌟 Reddit : https://www.reddit.com/user/BluezeC_DA
🌟 Pinterest : https://id.pinterest.com/BluezeCDA/

For those of you who want to know about Guns Girl Z, you can visit this Guns Girl Z community with me
💠Guns Girl Z Foxgirl Guild: https://discord.gg/6thCMjFHFR
💠Guns Girl Z Community : https://discord.gg/XAMaFrDYMD

💠Guns Girl Z (Hoyodex) Fans Wiki : https://hoyodex.miraheze.org/

For those of you who want to know about Honkai Impact, you can visit this Honkai Impact Community :
💠Honkai Impact 3rd (Hoyostans) Fans Webpage : https://hoyostans.be/
💠Official Discord Honkai Impact 3rd : https://discord.gg/hi3 
💠Official Youtube Honkai Impact 3rd : https://www.youtube.com/HonkaiImpact3rdGlobal
💠Official Instagram Honkai Impact 3rd : https://www.instagram.com/honkaiimpact3rd/
